description: A reportable media mover device status change has occured

event.Summary: Reportable media mover device status changed to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorMoverTrap LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorHostName s EXAMPLE LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::moverStatus i 1 LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::moverSerNum s EXAMPLE

description: Name of the host on which the library monitor is running.
Note that the access on this is not-accessible, so this
should not be read by a SNMP management application. This
is only here so that a MIB compiler doesn't error when it
gets to the traps at the bottom of the MIB
variables.name: LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorHostName

description: Library or autoloader serial number if reported in the Inquiry command, page 0x80.
variables.name: LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::moverSerNum

description: A reportable tape device status change has occured.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorTapeDeviceTrap LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorHostName s EXAMPLE LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::moverSerNum s EXAMPLE LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::tapeStatus i 1

description: Name of the host on which the library monitor is running.
Note that the access on this is not-accessible, so this
should not be read by a SNMP management application. This
is only here so that a MIB compiler doesn't error when it
gets to the traps at the bottom of the MIB
variables.name: LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::libraryMonitorHostName

description: Library or autoloader serial number if reported in the Inquiry command, page 0x80.
variables.name: LIBRARYMONITOR-MIB::moverSerNum
